title: In 1977, did the story of the time of 1977 provide advice on "how to survive in the next ice age "?
subtitle: While a number of media outlets reported some short-lived scientific concerns about global refrigeration in the 1970s, viral images allegedly presenting a cover story on the subject had been forged.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: "Time" published a cover story entitled "How to Survive From the Next Ice Age" in 1977.
